Texts.Chs: 如果摄像头拍到你，门就会关上。^green;双击[W]以激活^orange;隐身^reset;并保持在摄像头视线之外。
Texts.Eng: If the camera spots you, the door will close. ^green;Double tap [W] to activate ^orange;stealth ^reset;and keep out of sight.

Texts.Chs: 隐身不会永远持续下去。快点，否则你不会及时到达终点的！
Texts.Eng: Stealth will not last forever. Be quick, or you won't reach the end in time!

Texts.Chs: 如果你被发现了，地板就会塌陷。快躲起来！
Texts.Eng: The floor will fall away if you are spotted. Stay out of sight!

Texts.Chs: 你已经完成了测试课程。干得好！
Texts.Eng: You have completed the test course. Well done!
